name: alibaba.einvoice.income.ocr.return
apiChineseName: 服务商回传发票ocr的结果
description: 服务商回传发票ocr的结果，分两种场景：扫描驱动服务商主动回传；阿里主动发起的ocr回传

requestParams.name: checksum
requestParams.description: 校验码，ocr结果为普票，success=true并且invoiceKind=1时必填

requestParams.name: invoice_date
requestParams.description: 开票日期，格式为yyyy-MM-dd，success=true时必填

requestParams.name: invoice_kind
requestParams.description: 发票种类，1=普票，2=专票，success=true时必填

requestParams.name: req_index
requestParams.description: 开票请求标识，扫描驱动回传type=1时填批次号

requestParams.name: sum_price
requestParams.description: 不含税金额，ocr结果为专票，success=true并且invoiceKind=2时必填

requestParams.name: type
requestParams.description: 请求类型，0=阿里主动发起的cor，1=扫描驱动服务商主动回传ocr结果

responseParams.name: is_success
responseParams.description: 接口调用结果，true=成功，false=失败，subCode以isp开头时需要服务商重试
